titleInfo.title: TVP23 interacts genetically with the yeast SNARE VTI1 and functions in retrograde transport from the early endosome to the late Golgi

name.namePart: Research Group G. Fischer von Mollard

subject.topic: N-ethlylmaleimide-sensitive fusion protein attachment protein receptor
